name: Memory Buster - Matching Crush
description:
Find and combine matching cards in this fantasic adventure with lots of different levels.

Find 3 cards in a row to create a special move. Play against time or limited number of moves. Proof your skill when you need to find specific cards. A fantastic game with permanently changing goals.

These are the highlights of Memory Buster:

- Collect pairs of cards before you run out of moves

- Collect as many pairs as possible to reach a minimum score

- Get rewarded with additional scores for remaining time or moves

- Challenge your friends on facebook

- Earn special moves that help you in clearing hard levels

----------------------------

Are you already fan of Memory Buster ? Like us on Facebook to be informed on hot news !

https://www.facebook.com/Memory-Buster-1029275037115303/

Memory Buster can be played completely for free, however special actions can be bought with real money.
